BasicInfo.short: Whil helps organizations create happier, healthier, and high-performing workforces with resiliency and mindfulness training.

Products.name: now
Products.description: Our NOW program includes 450+ sessions of mindfulness meditation and yoga training for adults.

Products.name: grow
Products.description: Our GROW program includes 450+ sessions of mindfulness training for teens.

Products.name: Search Inside Yourself
